review:
He is very good and cooperative doctor. 
He is by birth doctor of my son from Max Hospital Patparganj..
I visit him for my both kids as he is one of Doctor who listen to patient problem and give you time to prescribe right medicine. 

Even I recommend my college also to consult for any paediatric problems.

review: We appreciate the doctor time for our new born, however the minimum consulting fee is Rs 600. That's all.
He is very good doctor.  Explains the problem with great detail.  Very friendly in nature. I would recommend him for all the Pediatric problems.

review: *** **** ************ * **** ****** ** *** ******** ****** Not only he forms a bond with the children he treats but also interacts well in detail with their parents. My daughter is always happy to meet him. Would recommend to visit him at max healthcare, patparganj because there is a lot of rush at his clinic. It is advisable to take prior appointment before visiting his clinic.
